text.name: systemDesc
text.text: ioquake3 is a project that aims to improve and update the Quake 3 engine, which was released by id Software as open source in 2005. ioquake3 adds many features and fixes to the original engine, such as SDL 2, OpenAL, VoIP, x86_64 support, PNG support, and more. ioquake3 also supports various games and mods based on the Quake 3 engine, such as OpenArena. ioquake3 has been ported to many platforms, including the Nintendo 3DS.

B. OpenArena. ioquake3 wurde auf viele Plattformen portiert, darunter auch auf den Nintendo 3DS.
